text: Karim Belhocine (born 2 April 1978) is a retired French footballer who played as a midfielderKarim Belhocine | FOOTGOAL : Le webzine n°1 de l'actualité du Football Belge et International and currently managing Charleroi. ==Biography== Belhocine was born in Vénissieux, France, to Algerian parents. His father is from Lakhdaria, while his mother is from Akbou. Belhocine previously played for the Belgian side RE Virton, the Portuguese club S.C. Espinho, as well as the French amateur clubs US Forbach and Trélissac . On 8 May 2008, he joined K.V. Kortrijk, which gained promotion to the Belgian First Division, on a free transfer from Virton.Transferts : Karim Belhocine au KV Kortrijk - Football algérien On 19 July 2011, Belhocine signed a two-year contract with Belgian Pro League side Standard Liège. ==Honours== ===Club=== K.A.A.
